title: Has a smart home been invented yet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Homes are not smart. The term Smart Home just refers to homes with some form of automation. Anything from an intruder alarm which calls the police if broken into could make it a ‘Smart Home’. A mood lighting system like Rako or Lutron which enables different keypad buttons to do different things, depending on what time of day it is, could be classed as Smart Home like. How about there presence of voice control? Install an Amazon Alexa and a compatible TV and you can say “Aexa Turn the TV on” and the tV will switch on. Is this the level required for a Smart Home? So what would you class as a Smart Home? Until we have a definition of what a Smart Home is, there is no way of telling and if or when one was or will be invented.

Yes, by typically making a home smart with the use of various devices. These devices respond to sensors to make life, our home comfortable and they communicate and respond to our voice command. The good thing is they are energy saving with a reasonable energy efficiency level thereby reducing energy bills. Smart home technology is now really common as people have accepted and adopted these home automation into their way of life.
